resources.string:
France will be the guest country
of honor during the next
edition of the Aerospace fair
México 2023 (FAMEX 2023) that
will be held on April 29
2023, at the Military Air Base
Number 1 located in Santa Lucia,
State of Mexico, as reported
by General Sandoval Dueñas,
president of the committee of the Mexico
Aerospace Fair presented the letter of acceptance of France as Guest Country of Honor of FAMEX 2023 to Mr. Jean-Yves Le Drian
Minister of Foreign Affairs of the French Republic.

France is the fourth trading partner\and sixth source of investment of 
Mexico is among the countries that
make up the European Union since
since the beginning of the century it has
invested more than $5.2 billion
dollars in various manufacturing factories
in San Luis Potosí,
Puebla, Queretaro, Tamaulipas and
the City of Mexico, in
priority sectors, such as aeronautics,
detailed the head of FAMEX.

To date, France is the
main employer in the sector

Mexican Aerospace Federation to promote and strengthen the aerospace industry.
Tel:+52 1 5544525697

Address: Calle XXX #XX Col.X, XXXXX, XXXXX
To visit the aircraft at the fair, please consult their location on the general map

The Mexican Aerospace Fair is an international event organized by the Mexican Air Force through the SEDENA, which showcases cutting-edge technology and products from the aerospace and space industries.
It started in 2015, to celebrate 100 years of Military Aviation in Mexico, becoming a platform to drive the economic development of the national aerospace sector.

Bringing together the leaders of the aerospace and space industries to facilitate trade exchange and drive the growth of the national and international aerospace industry through foreign investment and job creation.

"Mexico and France have maintained diplomatic relations since November 1826 and, since then, have generated economic ties that have resulted in a close, dynamic and complementary economic and trade relationship. France is Mexico's fourth largest trading partner and sixth largest source of investment among the countries that make up the European Union. It is worth noting the economic and trade relationship between Mexico and France. The economic and commercial relationship between Mexico and France and, in particular, the impact of the investment made by French companies in Mexico to strengthen productive linkages between our countries and their cooperation, social responsibility and sustainability projects in our country."

"France is the second largest exporter in the world in the aerospace industry, which is characterized by significant capital investments and high technological content.\nIt is a global leader in areas such as engines, integrated systems, avionics, drones, and business jets.\nAmong the aerospace companies in France, notable ones include: Airbus, Safran, Dassault Aviation, Aerocampus Aquitaine, Aeroplast, Safety Line, Thales, WashTech, and others."

"In the case of France, research efforts in the aerospace industry represent about 11% of the national business research and development internal spending, being the second highest contributing sector."

"The excellence of French higher education is widely recognized throughout the world. France invests massively every year in higher education and research; education ranks first in state budget expenditure, i.e. more than 20%. French industrial, technological and scientific successes (space, transport, medicine, etc.), the number of Nobel prizes or Field medals, show that France is one of the most dynamic poles of innovation and research."

"The Mexican Air Force in coordination with the Mexico Aerospace Fair (FAMEX) have created a space dedicated to the country's most emblematic planes, allowing the general public to observe the beauty and historical value of each element at the Military Aviation Museum (MUMA)."

"The Mexican Air Force in coordination with the Mexico Aerospace Fair (FAMEX) have created a space dedicated to the country's most emblematic planes, allowing the general public to observe the beauty and historical value of each element at the Military Aviation Museum (MUMA)."

"FAMEX was created to boost the aviation market in the country, which not only attracted foreign investments, but also brought the general public closer to the history of aviation in Mexico. That's why we invite you to learn more about us in our room at MUMA, located at Military Air Base No. 1 in Santa Lucia."
ENJOY OUR 360° TOUR\n OF THE FAMEX ROOM AT MUMA!
"What are the dates and hours of the fair?"
"General public over 18 years of age with valid ID."
"Access only on April 29th as long as they are accompanied by an adult."
"The Secretary of National Defense through the Mexican Air Force."
"Yes, just don't forget to tag us, remember to follow us on our social networks."
"Is identification required for access to the Fair?"
"Through the mobile application and the website."
"What kind of aircraft will there be?"
"You can check in the static exhibition section of the FAMEX application."
"You can attend all the conferences, you just have to register in the App and Website."
"What events will be held during the fair?"
"Conferences, static exhibitions and air shows, don't miss it!"
"In the Prefamex section you can see which transportation services we offer and their location."
BRIGADIER GENERAL JAVIER SANDOVAL DUEÑAS COMMITTEE PRESIDENT
BRIGADIER GENERAL GABRIEL GARCIA JIMENEZ EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR

Terms and Conditions

 "Famex-2023" is an international event in the business field; therefore, admission will be granted only to individuals over 18 years of age. After purchasing tickets, there will be no refunds available. In case of requiring an invoice, it must be generated at the time of payment. The electronic tickets through this website have an additional cost of $56.00 MXN pesos for the service fee paid with a debit or credit card. In case of any payment clarifications or discrepancies, please contact 5557634265 / support@a-id.cloud. Please be reminded that the purchase of "Famex-2023" accreditation is personal, as well as your access ticket, which will be delivered to you along with your badge, which will be for one-time use and non-transferable.

PRIVACY NOTICE

CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE

This privacy notice describes how the Feria Aeroespacial Mexico 2023 (Famex-2023) committee, located at Av. Santos Dumont S/N, Col. Aviación civil, Venustiano Carranza CP.15740, in Mexico City, will use, share, and protect the personal information that is collected when you visit our website and event applications. Additionally, we inform you that this notice may be supplemented by adding privacy terms or additional notices.

INFORMATION THAT FAMEX 2023 COLLECTS

 The personal information that the committee collects directly from you includes contact data such as name, age, company you work for, address, position or job title, telephone numbers, email addresses, and website. INFORMATION THAT THE REGISTRATION COMPANY COLLECTS AND PROTECTS
 
Internet Protocol ("IP") address used to connect your computer (note: devices) to the Internet 
Payment information or debit, credit, or other payment methods 

USE THAT FAMEX 2021 WILL GIVE TO YOUR INFORMATION
 
The collected information will be used for statistical, commercial, and security purposes established by the committee, which may include, among others, the following activities: 
Manage your entry to the event, conferences, and seminars. 
Respond to your requests, questions, comments, or doubts. 
Provide services and offer additional content according to your interests and needs. 
Strengthen, evaluate, and improve the service, advertising, and programs of the event. 
Analyze trends in the aeronautical, defense, and security sectors for statistical purposes. 
Notify changes or updates of the products and services of "FAMEX-2023." 
Provide the survey about the event. 
Access information about products, services, events, exhibitions, and conferences of "FAMEX-2023"; the exhibitors, sponsors, and other related organizations. 
Generate a database by scanning the accreditation badge when visiting stands or chalets, to share your contact information with exhibitors, sponsors, government agencies, and third parties associated with the committee. 
Respond or comply with any law, regulation, subpoena, court order, or other legal obligation. 
Enforce or protect your rights and properties. 
Detect, investigate, and help prevent security threats, fraud, or other malicious activity. 
*The Feria Aeroespacial Mexico 2023 committee reserves the right to use for advertising purposes the photographs, videos, and other material captured during any activity during the event. 
Any information that you publicly disclose may be collected and used by others (note j: third parties), without any control or protection by the committee. Transfer of your information abroad
 Your information may be transferred to companies in other countries. By using the service, you consent to the transfer of information to countries other than your country of residence, which may have different laws regarding the protection of personal data. 

CHANGES TO OUR PRIVACY POLICY
 
This privacy notice may undergo modifications, changes, or updates resulting from new legal requirements; the committee's own needs, or other causes. Any changes to the present notice will be announced on this page. (note j: app) 

CONTACT
 
If you have any questions, comments, or requests regarding this privacy policy or our processing of your information, please contact: 
Commercial Management of the "FAMEX" Committee 
Av. Santos Dumont S/N, Colonia Aviación Civil, Venustiano Carranza, C.P. 15740, Cd. De México 
Email: gercom@f-airmexico.com.mx 
Phone: +52(55)70985299
